title: Arch Creek Animal Clinic
projectDetails1: Arch Creek Animal Clinic is a fully responsive website for pet hospital
projectDetails2: Website using react-router for routing, react-bootstrap for styling, and react-slick for carousel.

title: Nexus Travels
projectDetails1: Nexus Travels is a responsive Tour & Travel related Website
projectDetails2: A user can buy a tour from the Nexus Travels homepage. When the user clicks the book now button, the user will be redirected to the login page. After successfully logged in by google sign-in or another method, the user can check out the product. Users can also check the userâ€™s orders on the Order page.
projectDetails3: An admin can add tours in the add product section of the admin page, which will be shown on the Home page instantly.

title: Bike Junctions
projectDetails1: Bike Junctions is a bike store Web App.
projectDetails2: Clients can book a buy and select their destination after login in using the google authentication system implemented using firebase.
projectDetails3: Users can see the bike details on the user dashboard with a map.
